summary: Two clowns living in Korea's Chosun Dynasty get arrested for staging a play that satirizes the king. They are dragged to the palace and threatened with execution but are given a chance to save their lives if they can make the king laugh.
cast: Woo-seong Kam|Jin-young Jung|Seong-Yeon Kang|Lee Joon-Gi|Hang-Seon Jang|Hae-Jin Yoo|Seok-yong Jeong|Seung-Hun Lee|Shin Jeong-geun|Yeong-seok Lee|Young-Suck Lee|Hyeon Woo
title: Wang-ui namja
